name: Cair Health
long_description:
Cair Health empowers billing companies, care management platforms, EHRs, offshore BPOs, provider groups, and specialty pharmacies with AI-driven RCM solutions.  Our suite of AI Agents helps RCM teams streamline operations, reduce manual costs, and improve consistency—while maintaining full control over core workflows. Cair is trusted by 100+ practices across the country — including iconic VC-backed digital health startups, leading specialty EHRs, and some of the largest billing companies and BPOs

Backed by Y Combinator, Foundation Capital, Soma Capital, Translink Capital & many others..
one_liner: Predictive analytics and automation for medical claims
